definition: pit/threshold/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing water/☵
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry

sentences.english: It's the harsh truth where Cancún communiques fall silent.
sentences.chinese: 殘酷的事實是坎昆公報停滯了這件事。

sentences.english: At least the negotiations are happening in balmy Cancun, right?
sentences.chinese: 至少談判正在暖和的坎昆進行着，是嗎？

sentences.english: China supports the efforts made by the Mexican side for the success of Cancun Conference.
sentences.chinese: 中方支持墨方爲坎昆會議取得成功所做努力。

sentences.english: A cloud of locusts in Cancun, Mexico, in 2006
sentences.chinese: 阿雲，2006年在墨西哥坎昆，蝗蟲。

sentences.english: Their best chance to do that is in Cancún.
sentences.chinese: 做到這一點的最佳機會就在坎昆。

sentences.english: Rows of palm trees line a tropical beach in Cancun, which lies on the Caribbean Sea.
sentences.chinese: 成行的棕櫚樹在加勒比海坎昆的熱帶海灘上排成了行。

sentences.english: These parties are focused on implementing the Cancún mandate.
sentences.chinese: 這些陣營都將目標集中在執行坎昆任務上。

sentences.english: "We are going to Cancun, " Afridi said.
But Ezcurra argues that Cancun was built with fatal flaws.
sentences.chinese: 不過埃茲柯拉辯稱，坎昆是在致命缺失上建造起來的。

sentences.english: Jia Qinglin delivered a brief speech at the Cancun airport.
sentences.chinese: 賈慶林在坎昆機場發表了簡短書面講話。

sentences.english: If we do so, agreement at Cancún is within reach.
sentences.chinese: 如果做到這一點，就可以在坎昆達成協議。

definition: Republic of Palau or Belau (Pacific island nation)
Bora Bora, island of the Society Islands group in French Polynesia
Fiji, country in the southwest Pacific Ocean
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Kota Kinabalu (capital of Sabah state, Malaysia)
Réunion (island in Indian Ocean, a French overseas department) (Tw)
Réunion (island in Indian Ocean, a French overseas department)
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
